xdi2.messaging

Class MessageBase<N extends XdiEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.MessageBase<N>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<MessageBase<N>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Message, MessageTemplate

    public abstract class MessageBase<N extends XdiEntity>
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<MessageBase<N>>
    An XDI message, represented as a context node.
    Author:
    markus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createOperation

        public Operation createOperation(XDIAddress operationXDIAddress,
                                 XDIAddress targetXDIAddress)
        Creates a new operation and adds it to this XDI message (template).
        Parameters:
        operationXDIAddress - The operation address to use for the new operation.
        targetXDIAddress - The target address to which the operation applies.
        Returns:
        The newly created, empty operation, or null if the operation address is not valid.
